title: Game-Based Language Learning Design: Application of the Dota Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency Enhancement in Game-Based Learning Design Using Mobile Devices in Resource-Constrained Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for designing language lessons utilizing game mechanics (team collaboration, competition, strategic thinking)
Learners can develop at least two game-based formative assessment tools applicable in mobile environments
Learners can structure a collaborative learning scenario incorporating game elements into three stages: preparation, implementation, and evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
